languages.text: "Я бы с радостью померил{mf|ся|ась} силами, да только боюсь нечаянно прихлопнуть уставшего старика".

traits.locale_text: "Я бы с радостью померил{mf|ся|ась} силами, да только боюсь нечаянно прихлопнуть уставшего старика".

languages.text: "I would gladly do battle with you, but I fear I may accidentally swat that tired old man."
languages.original_text: "Я бы с радостью померил{mf|ся|ась} силами, да только боюсь нечаянно прихлопнуть уставшего старика".

traits.locale_text: "I would gladly join forces, I am just afraid of accidentally swatting that tired old man."
"I would gladly join forces, I am just afraid of accidentally swatting that tired old man."
"I would gladly join forces, I am just afraid of accidentally swatting that tired old man."
"I would gladly join forces, I am just afraid of accidentally swatting that tired old man."
"I would gladly do battle with you, but I fear I may accidentally swat that tired old man."
"I would gladly do battle with you, but I fear I may accidentally swat that tired old man."

languages.text: «Me encantaría luchar a su lado, pero no quisiera matar por accidente a ese viejo».
languages.original_text: "I would gladly do battle with you, but I fear I may accidentally swat that tired old man."

traits.locale_text: «Me encantaría que uniéramos nuestras fuerzas, pero no quisiera matar por accidente a ese viejo».

languages.text: “我很愿意和你并肩作战，我只害怕会不小心打到那位疲惫的老人。”
languages.original_text: "I would gladly do battle with you, but I fear I may accidentally swat that tired old man."

traits.locale_text: “我很愿意和你联手，我只害怕会不小心打到那位疲惫的老人。”

languages.text: « Je combattrais volontiers avec vous, mais j'aurais peur d'écraser ce vieillard par mégarde. »
languages.original_text: "I would gladly do battle with you, but I fear I may accidentally swat that tired old man."

traits.locale_text: « Je me joindrais volontiers à vous, mais j'aurais peur d'écraser ce vieillard par mégarde. »

languages.text: 「喜んで力を合わせたい。ただ、あの疲れた老人をうっかり叩いてしまったようだ」
languages.original_text: "I would gladly do battle with you, but I fear I may accidentally swat that tired old man."

traits.locale_text: 「喜んで力を合わせたい。ただ、あの疲れた老人をうっかり叩いてしまったようだ」

languages.text: "Ich würde liebend gern mit Euch kämpfen, doch ich fürchte, ich könnte diesen müden alten Mann versehentlich töten."
languages.original_text: "I would gladly do battle with you, but I fear I may accidentally swat that tired old man."

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde mich sehr gerne mit Euch zusammentun, ich habe nur Sorge, dass ich aus Versehen diesen müden alten Mann umwerfe."

languages.text: "Seninle memnuniyetle çatışmaya girerim ancak yanlışlıkla bitkin düşen şu ihtiyar adamı ezerim diye korkuyorum."
languages.original_text: "I would gladly do battle with you, but I fear I may accidentally swat that tired old man."
